title: Aleksei Vladimirovich Rybin
text:
Aleksei Vladimirovich Rybin (; born 26 January 1988) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar%20%282018%29">Kuban Krasnodar</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Tambov">FC Tambov</a> on 17 August 2019 in a game against <a href="FC%20Krasnodar">FC Krasnodar</a>, as a starter.
